verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
There, so there you're standing in a room
With a million things to do,
And more places left to go
You think you're always on your own
There's no one else to hold your hand
So you throw your life away

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
We try to live this life out on our own
We die never knowing what we'd know
We try

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
You, you have so much to pursue
You want to be all you can be
With the fame and the money
But at night you lay alone
Your heart is trembling as you think
Is this all I'll ever be?
